name: Attendance
description: Returns attendance results from the Attendance tool for each user in a selection of org units. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute Attendance (Organization level) Available Filters Returned Fields

columns.name: User Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the user.

columns.name: Org Defined Id
columns.description: User's Org Defined Id (often the learner identifier from an SIS system).

columns.name: Username
columns.description: User's username.

columns.name: First Name
columns.description: User's first name.

columns.name: Last Name
columns.description: User's last name.

columns.name: Role Name
columns.description: User's role in the specific course offering.

columns.name: Role Id
columns.description: User's role Id in the specific course offering.

columns.name: Attendance Register Id
columns.description: Unique attendance register identifier.

columns.name: Attendance Register Name
columns.description: The name given to the register.

columns.name: Attendance Session Id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the session.

columns.name: Attendance Session Name
columns.description: The given name of the session.

columns.name: Scheme Symbol Id
columns.description: Unique scheme symbol identifier.

columns.name: Symbol Name
columns.description: The name given to the symbol.

columns.name: Symbol Value
columns.description: The value used for the symbol.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: The score as a percentage that contributes towards the attendance score when a symbol is given. Field can be null.

columns.name: Last Modified
columns.description: Date the symbol for the user in the session was last modified (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: Course Offering Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the course offering.

columns.name: Course Offering Code
columns.description: Often the course identifier from an SIS system.

columns.name: Course Offering Name
columns.description: Name of the course offering.

columns.name: Course Section Id
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the section.

columns.name: Course Section Code
columns.description: Client defined code for the section.

columns.name: Course Section Name
columns.description: Name of the section.

columns.name: Parent Department Name
columns.description: Name of the department the course offering is under.

columns.name: Semester Name
columns.description: Name of the semester the course offering is under.
